hackathon-judges.judge-role: Digital Engagement Manager, City of Reno
Executive Director, Truckee Meadows Regional Planning Agency

hackathon-requirements:
must include features and functionality focused on using data to build apps that benefit residents in the city of Reno. 
 
You must present a demo that walks through the main functionality of the solution. You must also submit at least one image/screenshot of your working solution.
 Solutions may be newly created or pre-existing. If submitting an existing solution (developed prior to this competition), it must include new features/functionality added after the start of the submission period, which specifically aims to promote civic good in the city of Reno. 
All code must be made available on the Hack4Reno github, Hack4Reno will work with teams after the event if they are not experienced with git.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Try everything. This pack includes two Tessels and one of every module (+ a second NRF so they can talk to each other).
$100 Amazon Gift Cards (one per team member)
Kindle Fire HD 6 Tablets (one per team member)

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: All code must be made available on the Hack4Reno github, Hack4Reno will work with teams after the event if they are not experienced with git.
Does the app meet a need in the Reno area? Does the app or service help to inform/engage the people of Reno?
Is the solution novel? Does it solve a problem in a creative or never-seen-before way?

hackathon-description-header: Join us in a hackthon to build a smarter city.
